sentences.english: Friends worldwide are welcome to know more Tiens and experience Tiens products.

sentences.english: With exquisite workmanship, PE celebrated, unique flavor from home or abroad.
sentences.chinese: 益以工藝精湛，風味獨特著稱，飲譽海內外。

sentences.english: But economic problems at home can also make people feel they have few other choices.
sentences.chinese: 但海內的經濟問題也會使人們感到抉擇餘地未幾。

sentences.english: Thank you for your Building Decoration Engineering Co. , Ltd. home and abroad, the support and love.

sentences.english: In the last several years, we won the customer's trust and support.
sentences.chinese: 幾年來贏得了海內外客戶的信任和支持。

sentences.english: I must admit I am very fond of collect rare book.

sentences.english: We sincerely welcome friends from various circles at home and abroad visit the guide and experiment.

sentences.english: Welcome to contact us by calling or letter.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎海內外客商來電來函洽談業務聯繫。

sentences.english: They only want to solve domestic problems.
sentences.chinese: 他們只希望解決海內的問題。

sentences.english: Welcome wholeheartedly domestic and foreign friends to develop long-run cooperation with us.
sentences.chinese: 竭誠歡迎海內外朋友與此同我們發展長遠經貿合作。

sentences.english: The Bashu United League is an organization of people from Sichuan Province in China and abroad.

sentences.english: Social network for connecting Africans and Caribbeans at home and abroad.

sentences.english: Sincerely welcome all to visit our company and do business with us.

sentences.english: Weclome customers to discuss the cooperation with us.
